apis.name: Labels API
apis.description: Interact with labels using the REST API.

apis.name: List labels
apis.description: By default, this request returns 20 results at a time because the API results are paginated.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: with_counts
attributes.description: Whether or not to include issue and merge request counts. Defaults to false. (Introduced in GitLab 12.2)

attributes.name: include_ancestor_groups
attributes.description: Include ancestor groups. Defaults to true.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Keyword to filter labels by. Introduced in GitLab 13.6

apis.name: Get a single project label
apis.description: Get a single label for a given project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a project’s label.

attributes.name: include_ancestor_groups
attributes.description: Include ancestor groups. Defaults to true.

apis.name: Create a new label
apis.description: Creates a new label for the given repository with the given name and color.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the label

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color of the label given in 6-digit hex notation with leading ‘#’ sign (for example, #FFAABB) or one of the CSS color names

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of the label

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: The priority of the label. Must be greater or equal than zero or null to remove the priority.

apis.name: Delete a label
apis.description: Deletes a label with a given name.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a group’s label.

apis.name: Edit an existing label
apis.description: Updates an existing label with new name or new color. At least one parameter is required, to update the label.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a group’s label.

attributes.name: new_name
attributes.description: The new name of the label

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color of the label given in 6-digit hex notation with leading ‘#’ sign (for example, #FFAABB) or one of the CSS color names

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The new description of the label

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: The new priority of the label. Must be greater or equal than zero or null to remove the priority.

apis.name: Promote a project label to a group label
apis.description: Promotes a project label to a group label. The label keeps its ID.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a group’s label.

apis.name: Subscribe to a label
apis.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to a label to receive notifications. If the user is already subscribed to the label, the status code 304 is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a project’s label

apis.name: Unsubscribe from a label
apis.description: Unsubscribes the authenticated user from a label to not receive notifications from it. If the user is not subscribed to the label, the status code 304 is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: label_id
attributes.description: The ID or title of a project’s label
